description: This source file, 'ansc_dkto_tsaif.c', implements functions related to the Ansc Daemon Socket TCP Object, including handling application messages, sending TLS messages, and notifying events. It appears to be part of the network daemon's TCP socket management, specifically within the ANSC framework, and relates to TLS connection handling and message processing.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDktoTsaRecvAppMessage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessageBdo)
methods.description: Handles receiving an application message over the TCP socket, copying data into receive buffers, updating counters, and notifying the socket owner.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDktoTsaSendTlsMessage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hMessageBdo)
methods.description: Sends a TLS encapsulated message through the daemon engine, freeing the buffer descriptor afterward.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscDktoTsaNotifyEvent(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG ulEvent,ULONG ulError,ANSC_HANDLE hEventContext)
methods.description: Notifies the object of specific TLS connection events such as establishment or closure, updating internal status accordingly.
